name: Attack On Maid
description:
Us who made the game recently started in high school and couldn't focus that much on the jam but still made a little something.

Attack On Maid

The maids wanna clean your room but you don't want that. Your goal is to make a mess as big as possible while the maids clean your room. But be careful if there is no mess on the ground, you've lost!

You can buy different types of trash to put on the ground that has unique effects:

The eaten apple

It takes longer to clean and the maids focus their attention on this type of trash.

The crumpled paper

Is paper. Makes you money.

The Gucci Trashcan

Spawns a bundle of paper

You earn money the more trash you have but the more score you have the more maids come to clean.

Credits to:

Music:

Bensound for Royalty free music

Loyalty Freak Music

Effects:

Editing house

Boom sounds

Free sound stock

JP SFX

Gaming Sound FX

This was submitted to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 Let there be chaos
